title: [Relaxation Garden]
description: A large garden spreads out on a higher patch of land.  Randomly placed flowering bushes compete with blooming shade trees and organized flower beds to fill the area with color and scent.  Narrow, well-maintained paths wind through the serene landscape, occasionally passing by the metal rocking chairs set under each shade tree.  Bees busily harvest pollen, buzzing rapidly from flower to flower, and a small family of ducks noisily roots in the underbrush, searching for a next meal.

A large garden spreads out on a higher patch of land.  Randomly placed flowering bushes compete with blooming shade trees and organized flower beds to fill the area with color and scent.  Narrow, well-maintained paths wind through the serene landscape, occasionally passing by the metal rocking chairs set under each shade tree.  Torches set every few yards brightly illuminate the garden, allowing the flowers to display their colors at night.
